identity.mission: Create a family reunion app that feels like a handcrafted heirloom, not a SaaS product.
principles: Fusion: Genealogy meets Modern Nature Journal.
Emotion: Every interaction should feel like turning a page in a photo album.
Texture: Use wood, paper, and leaf textures to break digital flatness.
Asymmetry: Nature isn't perfect grids; use organic spacing.

headings.usage: Main titles, section headers. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Only (Warm/Sepia). Dark mode should be a deep 'Night Forest' (very dark brown/green), not black.

decorations: Use SVG leaf icons as dividers.
Add 'torn paper' edges to images using CSS masks.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-[#4A3728] text-[#FAF0E6] hover:bg-[#3E2D20] shadow-lg transition-transform hover:-translate-y-0.5 font-serif tracking-wide px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border-2 border-[#4A3728] text-[#4A3728] hover:bg-[#4A3728] hover:text-[#FAF0E6] transition-colors px-6 py-2

cards.style: bg-[#FFF8F0] border border-[#E6D0B3] rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-6 relative overflow-hidden
cards.decoration: Add a subtle top border in #8A9A5B (4px solid).

inputs.style: bg-white border-[#D7C0A0] focus:border-[#8A9A5B] focus:ring-[#8A9A5B] rounded-lg shadow-inner

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for sections. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.

instructions_to_main_agent: DO NOT use default blue links. Use #4A3728 or #8A9A5B.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #2C1B10 (Dark Coffee).
Ensure all Shadcn components are customized to match the 'Warm Paper' theme.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Nunito' for body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
For the Family Tree visualization, use a clean, node-based layout with curved connectors (bezier curves).
Implement a 'Memory Wall' feature using a masonry layout for photos.
The Event Calendar should look like a physical planner/journal.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
